ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: You only reinforce my point. When they are able to afford the new jewellery, what happens to the old? It doesn t go away! They either give it to the new
ygData.messageBody:
You only reinforce my point. When they are able to afford the new
jewellery, what happens to the old? It doesn't go away! They either give it
to the new characters they are creating, or sell it to someone else for a
ridiculously low price. Either way, we missed out on a sale...

--------------------------------------------------
> From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
>
> >From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
> >
> >on these items, remembering that items do not EVER go away, it won't be
> long
> >at all before EVERYONE has all they need and we will be left with a
> >worthless trade skill. Just my 2 coppers...
>
> I disagree. There's plenty of chararacters who would like the better
> jewlery but
> can't afford it so they will get the cheaper kind and keep trading up
> (hopefully)
>
> Plus the flow of new players and current players creating new characters.
>
> Azboklin the enchanter
>
